page.title: 11Playtime Games.
page.content: {Elastics.} Elastics is a favourite game among girls at our school.This is how you play it.First of all you need a loop of elastic and three people.Two people stand with the elastic round their ankles. The person who is left stands with one side of the elastic between their legs.Then they jump over so the other side of the elastic is between their legs.Next you stand in the middle,then jump on to both sides of the elastic.Now stand with your legs either side of the elastic,turn round so the elastic is round your ankles,then jump up and land in the middle.Next stand with your feet under one side of the elastic,jump over taking it with you.Stand on it then jump in the middle.You repeat this on knees and thighs.On the next stage the elastic is only on one leg.First you
